sentence.Network_en: Let us suppose that you or i, brethren, shall become a free and disembody spirit.
sentence.Network_cn: 诸兄弟, 让我们假设你或我将变成脱离了躯壳的自由精灵.

list.abs: As companies become disembodied into some Barlowian cyberspace , they take on the character of software ., 当各种公司取消实体进入某种巴洛式的赛博空间之后 , 它们就具有了某种类似于软件的特色.
